, or 67pc, while revenues from outside of the United States totalled US$ 4.38 bn, representing 52pc of total revenues.`` Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year,'' said Eric Schmidt . Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. The Times investigation cited several former NoW journalists stating that Andy Coulson had`` actively encouraged'' phone hacking.`` In fact'', the newspaper continued, an examination based on police records, court documents and interviews with investigators and reporters shows that Britain's revered police agency failed to pursue leads suggesting that one of the country's most powerful newspapers was routinely listening in on its citizens. This was followed by a Channel 4`` Dispatches'' programme, in which it was alleged that Andy Coulson had personally listened to hacked messages.
